fields.description: The 3-star superior family hotel Birkenhof is situated on a sunny hillside above the town of Freudenstadt. In the center of Freudenstadt is Europe's largest market square, just a 15 minutes walk away from the hotel.
fields.name: Hotel Birkenhof

fields.description: Set in the heart of Vienna, the hotel is just 16 minutes by direct train from the airport. Opposite the famous Stadtpark, the hotel is just 10 minutes' walk from Vienna attractions like the Opera House and St Stephen's Cathedral.
fields.name: Hotel Hilton Vienna

fields.description: Located at the Buddha Hill, surrounded by picturesque chestnut trees, just a short distance from Castle district. Best connection coming from Slovenia by motorway. Public transportation next to the hotel with easily access to shopping street and historical down town.
fields.name: Hotel Novotel Budapest

fields.description: Situated centrally and within easy reach of the Savignyplatz S-Bahn Station and the Uhlandstrasse Underground Station, the NH Berlin Kurferstendamm hotel is a central hub for business and leisure travelers alike. Just a few steps away from fascinating historical landmarks such as the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church and impressive business centers like the ICC Trade Fair, guests can access the best of Berlin and return to relaxing accommodations.
fields.name: Hotel NH Berlin

fields.description: Holiday resort/village at the little town Veysonnaz at the french-speeking Switzerland (Wallis) - located abofe the Rhone valley. Beautiful nature.
fields.name: Appartementhaus VeyssonazCentre

fields.description: This well-maintained art deco building is located in the centre of Merano, close to the new spa, the city theater, the spa hotel, the Passer Promenade and right next to shopping paradise Lauben. The hotel combines old world charm with the comfort of the 21st century.
fields.name: Hotel Europa Splendid

fields.description: The elegant 4* hotel Stefanie awaits vacationers only a stone's throw away from all the sights and attractions of Vienna's 1st district.
fields.name: Hotel Stefanie

fields.description: This family-run 5-star spa hotel offers plenty of space for relaxation and privacy. The house is a partner of the Sacher Hotels in Vienna and Salzburg, and is centrally located in a sunny and quiet location in Seefeld. Connoisseurs won't appreciate only the spacious rooms and the 2000 m2 spa, but also the excellent kitchen.
fields.name: Hotel Astoria Relax & Spa

fields.description: The Hotel Excelsior in Arosa is affected by the stylish ambience and the mediterranean, warm colours. With first class meals you will be in a culinary heaven and the calmness, the wonderful view to the mountain panorama and the liveley activities and a smooth relaxation programme makes sure, that you will have perfect holidays. Enjoy unforgettable sunny days at the Hotel Excelsior!
fields.name: Hotel Excelsior Arosa

fields.description: When you visit this fascinating city on the banks of the Donau river the Sheraton hotel Bratislava would like to welcome you to your home away from home. Thanks to the favourable location on the edge of the historic town centre one is only minutes away from the best that Bratislava has to offer.
fields.name: Hotel Sheraton Bratislava
